trends: Record-breaking attacks: Bybit ($1.436B) sets new theft record
Arithmetic bugs: Cetus shows how minor overflow errors can cause massive losses
North Korean dominance: Over $2.8B stolen by state-sponsored groups
CEX targeting: Shift from DeFi protocols to centralized exchanges
Rapid laundering: Bybit funds processed within 48 hours
Supply chain attacks: TraderTraitor targeting development tools
Cold wallet compromise: Previously 'safe' storage proven vulnerable
Industry collaboration: Rapid response and fund freezing improving
Validator intervention: Sui froze $162M showing blockchain control capabilities

for_exchanges: Implement m-of-n multi-signature for all critical operations
Segment cold storage across multiple wallets with different security levels
Deploy real-time anomaly detection for large transactions
Audit all third-party tools and supply chain dependencies
for_smart_contracts: Manual verification of all arithmetic operations
Use formal verification for critical functions
Multiple independent audits focusing on different aspects
Implement time delays for high-value operations
Deploy circuit breakers for anomalous activity
for_defi_protocols: Use decentralized oracles with multiple price sources
Implement reentrancy guards on all external calls
Add slippage protection and transaction limits
Regular security reviews of governance mechanisms
for_users: Verify all transaction details before signing
Use hardware wallets for significant holdings
Be cautious of social engineering attempts
